fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you sneeze, the host will post a message announcing that someone has sneezed. The first person to say bless you, other than yourself, will receive an added layer of defense on top of what they would normally have tonight. This applies to protective abilities that grant defense as well.
- You may sneeze multiple times during the same day. You may not sneeze again until someone has said bless you to your previous sneeze.
